page.title: 02School For Joanne Gascoigne.
page.content: When I go to school I get up at 7-30 a.m.I have a wash, get dressed and then I have my breakfast of cereal and a cup of tea.I go to school at 8-45. At 9 o'clock the teacher takes the register and then we go into assembly. Sometimes the headmistress reads a story and we sing hymns or have a prayer.We work until 10-30a.m.when it is breaktime.I have milk and then take my crisps outside to eat in the playground.Lunch is at 12-15.I have sandwhiches, but some children have hot lunches. We work or draw or have P.E. in the afternoon and at 3p.m. we go home, and I have my tea.After tea I put on my jeans and my coat and play outside until 7-30p.m.then I go inside and have a hot drink.Sometimes I watch the television or read a book.After a wash I go to bed at 8-30p.m.
